comment: She is a great professor and I highly recommend you take her for this course. It is very doable to pass this class as long as you put in the effort. This is not an easy class and you will need to put in the work, but if you give it your best effort you will pass.

We had 3 Test and 1 Final. Homework and Smartbook checks through Connect. Did take attendance. One of the most AMAZING professors I've taken at KSU. She genuinely cares about the students and makes sure you have everything you need to succeed. Study guide and practice exams provided. Will work if you to help you understand the material.

Dr. Hill is the best professor I've taken at Coles. Material consists of 2 tests, 1 cumulative final, excel project, ALEKS, learn smart & HW in connect for completion. Attendance not mandatory but recommended. Explains everything very clearly and encourages questions. Super friendly and respectful. Gives study guide & practice test. TAKE HER!! :)

Really nice professor who's helpful in class and provides plenty of resources to understand material. Uses connect like everyone else, but the HW and smart book is completion grade. Would take again for other courses.
